import { Meta, Story, ArgsTable, Canvas } from '@storybook/blocks';
import EditionButtonIcon from '../EditionButtonIcon';
import * as EditionButtonIconStories from './EditionButtonIcon.stories';

<Meta of={EditionButtonIconStories} />

# ButtonIcon

<br />

## `EditionButtonIcon` are used to display button icons for product editions.

<br />

### Default

<Canvas>
  <Story of={EditionButtonIconStories.Default} />
</Canvas>

## Usage Example

```jsx
import EditionButtonIcon from '@appdirect/sfb-theme-components/src/atoms/edition-button-icon/EditionButtonIcon';

<EditionButtonIcon theme="emphasisAlt" icon="plus">Add to Cart</EditionButtonIcon>

```

## Props

<ArgsTable of={EditionButtonIcon} />
